snippet: The head of the International Monetary Fund called on the nations of the world, particularly the United States and Europe, to press forward with fiscal and reform promises.
abstract: International Monetary Fund managing director Christine Lagarde calls on nations worldwide, particularly United States and Europe, to press forward with fiscal and reform promises to reduce uncertainties that are shackling growth.
lead_paragraph: The head of the International Monetary Fund called on the nations of the world, particularly the United States and Europe, to press forward with fiscal and reform promises.

headline.seo: I.M.F. Director Says Global Recovery Is Not Yet Secure
headline.main: Recovery Not Yet Secure, Director of I.M.F. Says
headline.print_headline: Recovery Not Yet Secure, Director of I.M.F. Says
